action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> open cupboard
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
> go to pantry
Turn 2
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> open refrigerator
Turn 3
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a orange and a banana.

> take apple
> take peach
Turn 4
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a apple.
> go to kitchen
Turn 5
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> go to living room
Turn 6
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> take book
> take chair
Turn 7
You take the book. In your inventory you have a apple and a book.
> go to kitchen
Turn 8
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> go to hallway
Turn 9
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
> go to broom closet
Turn 10
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop
> drop apple
Turn 11
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> drop book
> take mop
Turn 12
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
> go to kitchen
Turn 13
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
> go to hallway
Turn 14
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
> go to kitchen
Turn 15
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> put plate on counter
Turn 16
You put the plate on the counter.
> go to living room
Turn 17
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> put book on table
> put mop on table
> put plate on table
